creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: Santa Clause at LR walking towards portion of icicle covered house, carrying white bag over PR shoulder; reindeer in profile standing at top; portion of pine tree at UR frames image; inside: red block printed message, "Best Wishes for a Merry Christmas and A Happy New Year"
marks:
Signature, Date, and Inscription

inside L, in p bottom L page in pen; date LRC R page: [1952]
medium: Woodblock print; ink and colors on paper
title: Greeting Cards to H.E. Robison
